events.title: Building Your First DAPP Part 5
events.description: The world is being more and more decentralized. How do products envolve in such a place? Join us and learn form Robert how to develop the best best decentralized applications.

events.title: Hackathon: Build Your Own Chain
events.description: What would you do if you have your own blockchain? Let's forge our chains and build our own decentralized applications. Beer and refreshments are provided.

events.title: Blockchain bootcamp: A Brief Intro
events.description: Blockchain is getting more and more popular. If you want to learn more about this amazing techonology, join us in this one month crash course and master Blockchain!
